title: Can Adele's new music be heard in TV teaser?
text: Can Adele's new music be heard in TV teaser? Monday, 19 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Rumor has it the British songstress just unveiled a snippet of music from her third album Adele Teases Fans With New Music in TV Ad 00:46 Could it finally be time for some new Adele music? It's been a long four years since her last album and the singer appears to have teased British television viewers with a snippet of new music, broadcasted during an ad break on prime-time TV.
